CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 19, 1946, pg. 3, reads: "PLANNING 1947 'Y' FORUM SERIES - Members of the Centre Avenue YMCA Forum Committee (shown above) are planning one of the best forum series ever presented to a Pittsburgh audience. Opening with Pearl Buck Jan 20, the group will bring five outstanding national and international persons to the city.  The committee members are (reading clockwise): Miss Vivian Davidson, Paul Simon, Miss Jane Morin, Edward Ray, Mrs. Ruth Wilner, James M. Reid, chairman; Roland Sawyer, Sherman Harmon, Mrs. Rose Mukerji, Harold Keith, Miss Eugenia Brunot, Mrs. Eunice Cook, the Rev. J. O. Williams, Miss Lucy King and Miss Inez Womack. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Centre Avenue YMCA Forum Committee seated around banquet tables, clockwise: Vivian Davidson (Hewitt), Paul Simon, Jane Morin, Edward Ray, Ruth Wilner, James M. Reid, Roland Sawyer, Sherman Harmon, Rose Mukerji, Harold Keith, Eugenia Brunot, Eunice Cook, Rev. J. O. Williams, Lucy King, and Inez Womack, in Centre Avenue YMCA with Henry O. Tanner painting "Christ and His Mother" on wall
